\u201cSass variables CSS animation prope.title: Animatable CSS properties - CSS: Cascading Style Sheets | MDN
\u201cSass variables CSS animation prope.content: CSS Animations and Transitions rely on the concept of animatable properties, and all CSS properties are animatable unless otherwise specified. Each property's animation type determines how values combine - interpolate, add, or accumulate - for this property. Transitions only involve interpolation, whereas animations may use all three combination methods.
